bio: She is a mage who is primarily adept with Alternation and Illusion magic. She is an older Breton woman with white hair. She is currently in the fortress of Morvunskar with other mages and cultists. Her and the others worship Sanguine, the Daedric Prince of  hedonistic revelry and debauchery.
name: Drunk Cultist
notes: Shawn - done. Not activated in vanilla, but could by mod(s)
